text.title: US Capitol lockdown lifted after shooting
text.head: US Capitol lockdown lifted after shooting
Sources

list.item: AP and Chad Pergram. "US Capitol Building reopens after shooting suicide on western steps" — FoxNews , April 11, 2015
"Man commits suicide at the US Capitol" — WTTG , April 11, 2015
Kevin Freking. "US Capitol lockdown lifted after man fatally shoots himself" — Associated Press , April 11, 2015
